body.content:
Hello Dear,

My name is Princess Zahra Muatassim, a Franco-Ivoire and adopted child
of late Dr.Abdulaziz N'Guaram.Muatassim Who was a Former Prime
Minister and Minister in charge of Oil and Gas in Republic Of Cote'D
Ivoire from 2000 to 2010,mainly during the country political crises
and Later became an Oil Tycoon in Kuwait, Dubai and Saudi Arabia.

And one of Shareholder in Al Furat Petroleum Company in Arab Nations
(AFPC) the leader in the region in Reservoir Management. Private
shareholder in General Petroleum Corporation and Exxon Mobil Petroleum
Development (EMPD) based Kurdistan Region of Iraq before his sudden
death.

But when my father was sick in a private hospital here in Abidjan, he
secretly called me at his bed side, when I sat down to listen to him,
he started crying and complained that the world is too wicked because
of what is passing through and he also revealed to me that he has a
large sum of money deposited in my name in  a bank in Burkina Faso, he
intended to use the money for investment in Oil field in Iraqi before
his sudden death.

He also explained to me that it was because of his wealth that he is
suffering of the poison he received from his business associate
suspecting to be my uncles that is desperate to inherit his wealth
after years of his suffering. That l should seek assistance of a
Foreigner as his business partner for this particular deposit because
Foreigners are highly respected here in Africa.

I am contacting you to help me for the investment of $50 million (
Fifty Million United States Dollars) I inherited from my late father
into a good investment of your choice. I am ready to give you the 30%
of the total amount for your assistance and effort. it is very
important that you send me your details which includes:

1. Your Full Name
2. Your Age
3. Your Full house address
4. Your Mobile Phone Number

Regards,
Miss Zahra Muatassim.
